value.name: Renter advocates urge California leaders to extend eviction moratorium
value.description: The specter of eviction is real for many residents in the Sacramento area who are also burdened by the added frustration of knowing they can’t access the help that could save them.

video.name: Renter advocates urge California leaders to extend eviction moratorium

value.name: Video, audio captures moments before hostage-taking suspect was shot and killed by law enforcement
value.description: Mark Aitulagi Lavea was shot and killed May 6 by Calaveras County deputies and an Angels Camp police officer while the sheriff’s office says he held a 75-year-old hostage at gunpoint.

value.name: Suspect used handicapped hostage as human shield, sheriff's office says
value.description: What started as a domestic disturbance call turned into a hostage situation and deadly shooting in Calaveras County.

video.name: Suspect used handicapped hostage as human shield, sheriff's office says

value.name: Gunshot victim describes harrowing hostage experience, lauds ‘hero’ police
value.description: A gunshot victim who was held hostage by a Modesto man in a San Andreas apartment complex just moments before the man was shot dead by police is speaking out
